desc: This method deletes a file from your team.

errors.file_not_found: The file does not exist, or is not visible to the calling user.
errors.file_deleted: The file has already been deleted.
errors.cant_delete_file: Authenticated user does not have permission to delete this file.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
